response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special price of $9,500. This is a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 9500}
